snippet: Three new tools designed to make it easier to manage a small business.
abstract: Three new tools designed to make it easier to manage a small business.
lead_paragraph: Academics predicted the rise of a paperless society decades ago. We’re not there yet, but at least on the small-business front, we’re getting closer. In fact, a host of new tools have arrived recently, including Shake, an app platform that allows users to create, sign and send legally binding agreements from their smartphones; Zipmark, a digital checkbook; and SimpleScan, a mobile scanner and document management system that integrates with cloud apps used by small businesses.

headline.main: New Options for Small Businesses Looking to Go Paperless
